name: Windows Privilege Escalation Enumeration with WinPEAS
description: Run WinPEAS to scan a Windows system for misconfigurations and vulnerabilities that enable privilege escalation.

tools.name: WinPEAS
tools.description: Automated enumeration script for Windows privilege escalation vectors

steps.name: Download and Prepare WinPEAS
steps.description: Clone the repository and execute the appropriate WinPEAS binary (x64 or x86) on the target system.

steps.name: Run Full Enumeration
steps.description: Execute WinPEAS with full checks to identify services, scheduled tasks, file permissions, and other potential priv esc opportunities.

steps.name: Analyze Output
steps.description: Examine highlighted sections for exploitable issues like unquoted service paths, writable service binaries, or weak ACLs, then exploit accordingly.
